rooms.name: Bohemian Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious living room with eclectic Bohemian decor, comfortable seating arrangements, and abundant natural light.
elements: Plants and artistic decor to balance energy

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A vibrant dining space integrated with the living area, featuring a mix of modern and rustic design elements.
elements: Decorative motifs aligning with Vastu principles

rooms.name: Bohemian Kitchen
rooms.description: A functional kitchen space designed for family gatherings, featuring an open plan and a blend of traditional and modern appliances.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: The master suite includes a private balcony and en-suite bathroom with Bohemian design accents.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: A comfortable bedroom featuring ample storage, large windows, and soft Bohemian decor.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: A serene bedroom with a calm color palette and Bohemian decor to promote relaxation.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: A well-lit bedroom designed for family members, blending Bohemian aesthetics with practicality.

rooms.name: Bedroom 5
rooms.description: The final bedroom of the six offers a unique Bohemian touch, with modern comforts integrated into its design.

rooms.name: Bedroom 6
rooms.description: A versatile bedroom space that can serve as an additional guest room or creative studio, featuring Bohemian decor.

rooms.name: Master En-suite Bathroom
rooms.description: A private bathroom tailored to the master bedroom, featuring modern fixtures with a Bohemian touch.

rooms.name: Common Bathroom
rooms.description: A shared bathroom facility accessible to the other bedrooms, designed with Vastu-compliant layouts.

rooms.name: Closet & Storage Area
rooms.description: A dedicated storage room designed to keep clutter at bay, with ample closet space for the entire household.

rooms.name: Study/Office Area
rooms.description: A quiet workspace integrated into the living area, ideal for work-from-home setups and creative projects.

openings.description: A large, inviting entrance door in the South-West direction as per Vastu guidelines.
A secondary exit/entrance facilitating natural airflow and energy flow, located on the North-West wall.
Dual-car garage entrance designed to provide easy access while maintaining aesthetic integrity.
A direct walkway from the house to the swimming pool area, ensuring privacy and safety.
Multiple large windows distributed across the fa√ßade to maximize natural light in accordance with Vastu principles.
openings.location: Various walls including North-West, South-West, and East

garage_details.description: A two-car garage located adjacent to the main entrance, featuring ample storage space and a dedicated workshop area.

swimming_pool.description: An outdoor swimming pool integrated into the design, positioned for optimal sunlight exposure while maintaining privacy.
